work.description: Leading the frontend development team in building modern web applications using Vue.js and related technologies.
responsibilities: Architected and implemented the company's flagship SaaS product using Vue.js and Vuex
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to ensure code quality
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to implement responsive and accessible interfaces
Optimized application performance, reducing load time by 40%
Implemented automated testing with Jest and Cypress, achieving 85% code coverage

work.description: Developed and maintained client websites and web applications using modern frontend technologies.
responsibilities: Built responsive websites for clients across various industries
Converted design mockups into functional web interfaces
Implemented e-commerce functionality using Shopify and custom solutions
Collaborated with backend developers to integrate frontend with APIs
Participated in agile development processes, including daily standups and sprint planning

work.description: Assisted in the development of websites and digital marketing materials for agency clients.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained client websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Created email marketing templates that were responsive across different email clients
Assisted senior developers with debugging and quality assurance
Participated in client meetings and contributed to project planning
Learned and implemented best practices for web accessibility and SEO

volunteer.description: Contributing to open-source projects that support non-profit organizations and social causes.
responsibilities: Developed features for a volunteer management system used by multiple non-profits
Fixed bugs and improved accessibility in existing applications
Mentored coding bootcamp graduates on real-world projects
Participated in weekend hackathons to build solutions for community problems

volunteer.description: Taught web development skills to underrepresented groups in the tech industry.
responsibilities: Conducted weekly workshops on HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals
Created curriculum and learning materials for beginner web developers
Provided one-on-one mentoring to students working on personal projects
Organized coding events and hackathons for the local community
